title.en: Evangelical Formosan Church of North Carolina

statement.zh:
2026 台福總會年度主題：團契年 領受主恩，相愛合一
本教會主題：彼此服事,委身教會,跟隨耶穌
齊心建造北卡台福大家庭
statement.en:
Year of fellowship, receive His Grace, love in Unity
腓立比書 Philippians 2:1-2
